price: 17. ¡Glorificado sea Al-lah al anochecer y al amanecer!
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
